body:
Currently, if a user join a game, it navigates to the game-room waiting for all players to join and the hosts starts the game.
I the user navigates back in the browser, it goes to the initial dashboard that shows the list of avai├ºlable games. Once there, the user is not able to navigate again to the game-room of the game that has already joined.
The expected behavior is that a user that has already joined a specific game, should be able to navigate to the game when on the initial dashboard.
As a suggestion, the button can change from 'Join Game' to 'Open Game' or a text more intuitive to let the user know that it can enter that game room.

comments.body:
Implemented support for reopening games youÔÇÖve already joined from the lobby.

- Lobby now shows an "Open Game" button for games where the current user is already listed as a player, instead of only offering "Join Game".
- Clicking "Open Game" navigates back to /game-room/:id, so using the browser Back button no longer traps you on the dashboard.

Files changed:
- frontend/src/app/services/game.ts (PlayerSummary now includes userId)
- frontend/src/app/pages/lobby/lobby.ts
- frontend/src/app/pages/lobby/lobby.html

title: [BUG] Allow navigate to a game that I have already joined
